about_the_game:
Plue’s Cute Fantasy Worlds - Simple Beginnings offers you a mixture of adorable exterior and interior tiles. Perfect for the creation of idyllic small towns and
nearby forests.

Create your own cute little places!

This pack includes:

● Exterior Tiles:

○ Water, path, cliff and forest edge autotiles.
○ Building autotiles, additional roof bits, windows and an animated door character sheet.
○ 2 sheets of decoration: Trees, bushes, flowers, twigs, some veggies, leaves, fences, streetlights, well, bench, bridge, and more.

● Interior Tiles:

○ Walls, floors, carpets
○ 2 sheets of furniture (for kitchen, bath, bedroom, living room, study, tavern, ...)

● Extras:

○ Chest, barrel and box character sheet for opening animations / updated
graphics after using these objects.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
